titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Education to carry out a grant program to make grants to eligible entities to carry out full-day kindergarten programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Universal Full-Day Kindergarten Act
This bill requires the Department of Education to make grants to a state or local educational agency, an Indian tribal government, or a Bureau of Indian Affairs-funded school to carry out full-day kindergarten programs.
